author: ANA ORTIZ
text:
They writte their own positive reviews
They writte their own positive reviews. Please dont trust in this people. Always suddenly 300 positive reviews wrotten at the exact hour. This has been happening for the past days and weeksit  has  happened so many times before . They are scammers and dont have a phone number. Returns are a pain, lpst packages, only contact via email, hard to follow a return lost pacakge, refinds take 3 months .They writte their own reviews whem they are going down in sales. Believe me . Avoid this site.
title: They writte their own positive reviews

author: Omer
text: First and last time buying from the site. I excitedly ordered a pair of Yeezys which I was hoping to get at a great price (has been inflated by over 20% since then) and the purchase was “verified” by StockX and I received the delivery a week later. Well, the box at least. Because there was NOTHING in the box. And I had to go through Amar droid return of the empty box process along with sending multiple pictures. Stick to GOAT for verified shoes
title: First and last time buying here

author: Henry

title: My packet game damaged and it wasn’t…

author: Zuri M
text: I brought a pair of Concept air max 1 Mellow’s for my daughter for our vacation. They sent me a different pair of concept Air Max (a more boyish style). My daughter was very upset because she was really looking forward to The concept Mellow’s for our vacation, had outfits picked out and everything. When I contacted customer service (Via Chat) they had me send several pictures as proof that they were wrong. Finally, when they felt the “proof” was satisfying enough they apologized and let me know that someone else would be contacting me from customer service. The Next day I was contacted via email by Austin who gave me two options, and that due to the unique circumstances of the situation and company they couldn’t send me the right sneaker, so either I  return the sneakers for a full refund or take $25 off of the next order I make. After talking it over we decided to take the $25 off even though I felt that it wasn’t really enough, but whatever…so be it . So now I email Austin back our decision, he replies and to add insult to injury he tells me that he sent a code and that I have 90 days to use it. So now I’m on a time limit to order for someone else’s error. I just feel very disregarded and highly disappointed in Stock X.
title: I brought a pair of Concept air max 1…

author: Carol
text:

author: Verina
text:
Extremely disappointed.  I purchased a pair of LaMelo for my son.  StockX charged my credit card twice for 2 orders when I only ordered ONE PAIR.. ONE ORDER.
I have tried to no avail to contact  STOCKX by phone. 
I would appreciate if STOCKX COULD CONTACT ME AND PROVIDE ME WITH A FULL REFUND. 
THANK YOU
STEPHEN GREAVES and Verina Greaves
